plurals.name: banner_popup_alt_description
plurals.item: Tap below to open and swipe them in store when you collect your meals.
Tap below to open and swipe it in store when you collect your meal.

plurals.name: c2c_v3_invite_friends_completed_screen_info_body
plurals.item: Thanks to you, %1$d friends are saving food from going to waste and helping the planet. Now, enjoy your vouchers and grab your next Surprise Bag!
Thanks to you, your friend is saving food from going to waste and helping the planet. Now, enjoy your voucher and grab your next Surprise Bag!

plurals.name: c2c_v3_invite_friends_congrats_popup_description
plurals.item:
"Thanks to you, your friends have started rescuing food - together, you’re multiplying your impact on the planet!
Here’s your reward: %1$s vouchers worth %2$s to use towards new Surprise Bags. They're already in your account."

"Thanks to you, a friend has started rescuing food - together, you’re multiplying your impact on the planet!
Here’s your reward: a %2$s voucher to use towards a Surprise Bag before %3$s. It’s already in your account."

plurals.name: c2c_v3_invite_friends_description
plurals.item: Invite friends to try the Too Good To Go app! When they save their first Surprise Bag, you’ll earn %1$s vouchers.
Invite friends to try the Too Good To Go app! When a friend saves their first Surprise Bag, you’ll earn a %1$s voucher.
